string-array.name: fortune_list
string-array.item: The end is near and it is all your fault
meh.
Only listen to fortune cookie, disregard all other fortune telling units
Confucius says: Go to bed with an itchy bum, wake up with a stinky finger
Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors
You will die alone and poorly dressed
A new pair of shoes will do you a world of good
Now it is time to make circles with mints, do not haste any longer
Help! I am being held prisoner inside this android phone!
The fortune you seek will come with another glass of juice
Marriage lets you annoy one special person for rest of your life
Fortune says, a palm can say a lot, especially when it smacks
Today is probably a huge improvement over yesterday
Every exit is an entrance to new exit. Except the one in this office. It merely stinks
You can\'t be trusted to keep a secret
Confucius says: If you think we\'re going to sum up your life in this tiny message, you are crazy!
You will receive a fortune (message)
Someone has googled you recently
You will be hungry again in one hour
Don\'t drink any juice today, you will be very sick
How much deeper would be ocean be without sponges
You will read this and say "Geez, I could come up with better fortunes than that"
That ain\'t juice
You are not illliterate
An alien of some sort will be appearing to you shortly
Get a life
404 Fortune not found
Keep your goals away from the trolls
The stories you touch today, will be stuck, like, forever!
For a change you will code today
You know that code isn\'t going to write itself. Stop drinking free juice and get back
When you squeeze orange, orange juice comes out; because that\'s what\'s inside
A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking
A cynic is only a frustrated optimist
Flattery will go far tonight
A starship ride has been promised to you by the galactic wizard
A tub and a rub will change your day
Because of your melodic nature, the moonlight never misses an appointment
Confucius say you have heart as big as this glass of juice
It\’s about time I got displayed as a fortune
Never forget a friend. Especially if he owes you
Never wear your best pants when you go to fight for freedom
There is no mistake so great as that of being always right
You will gain admiration from your peers
Accept that some days you’re the pigeon, and some days you’re the statue
Don\'t sweat the petty things and don\'t pet the sweaty things
If opportunity doesn\'t knock, build a door
When everything’s coming your way, you’re in the wrong lane
Two days from now, tomorrow will be yesterday
Your inferiority complex not good enough. Try harder
Stop drinking now. Food poisoning no fun
You are cleverly disguised as responsible adult
Tomorrow at breakfast, listen carefully: do what rice krispies tell you to
Drive like hell, you will get there
Wise person either need good manners or fast reflexes
Practice safe eating. Always use condiments
Hard work pay off in future. Laziness pay off now
This fortune no good. Try another
Of all 27 alternatives, running away is best
